posts.title: MIT6.004 study notes
posts.text: Unit 1: Basics of InformationMIT好硬核啊，感觉这门课总体上应该是讲计算机组成的， 但是居然从Information Therapy引入？？？ Definition of Information Let $\mathit{E}$ be some event which occurs with probability $\mathit{P(E)}$. If we are told that $\mathit{E}$ has occured, then we say that we have received $\mathit{I(E)} = \log_2 \frac{1}{\mathit{P(E)}}$ bits of information. Base of log is unimportant Information: reduction inuncertainty. Entropy A $\mathit{Zero-memory}$ $\mathit{information}$ $\mathit{source}$ $\mathit{S}$ is a source that emits symbols from an alphabet ${\mathit{s_1, s_2, … , s_k}}$ with probabilities ${\mathit{p_1, p_2, … , p_k}}$, respectively, where symbols emitted are statistically independent. The average amount of information in observing the output of the source $\mathit{S}$ is called Entropy. $\mathit{H(S)} = \sum_i p_i \cdot \mathit{I(s_i)}$
恭喜吴某终于解决了spawn failed的问题，环境变量不嫌多，一个不行设两个:)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
